description: Stores API credentials and authentication files required for secure access to external data sources. Contains sensitive configuration files that enable automated data retrieval from HydroVu and other platforms.
purpose: Manage authentication credentials for API access while maintaining security best practices
security_classification: SENSITIVE - Contains API keys and authentication tokens

credential_types.description: OAuth2 client credentials for HydroVu API access
Authentication URL with embedded access keys for mWater API
credential_types.format: embedded in pipeline code or YAML file
content: authenticated_url - direct access URL with embedded credentials

authentication_workflow.step_1: Download credentials file from secure storage
authentication_workflow.step_2: Extract client ID and secret key
authentication_workflow.step_4: Use token for API requests throughout pipeline

access_control.encryption: credentials encrypted in transit and at rest
access_control.audit_logging: access attempts logged for security monitoring

security_measures.storage: credentials stored separately from code repositories
security_measures.transmission: HTTPS/TLS encryption for all API communications
security_measures.lifecycle: temporary download during processing, cleanup after use
security_measures.rotation: regular credential rotation following security policies

compliance.access_governance: credential access governed by role-based permissions
compliance.audit_requirements: maintains audit trail of credential usage

error_handling.missing_credentials: pipeline fails safely with clear error message

monitoring.access_logging: all credential access logged with timestamps
monitoring.usage_metrics: credential usage patterns monitored for anomalies

backup_and_recovery.backup_strategy: encrypted backups in separate secure location
backup_and_recovery.disaster_recovery: credential restoration part of DR plan
